item.title: Restore Previous Commit Without Changing HEAD
item.description: Goal Restore files from a previous commit to your working directory while keeping HEAD on the current branch (avoiding detached HEAD state). Find the Target Commit git log --oneline -n <N> Restore Files from Previous Commit git checkout <commit-hash> -- . This command: Updates all files in current directory and subdirectories to match the specified commit Leaves HEAD on your current branch (no branch switching) Only affects working directory, not branch pointer Without -- .
